name: Hearty Bulgur Pilaf
description: Coarse bulgur simmered with vegetables and spices for a comforting meal.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, heat butter or oil over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic, saut√© until fragrant and translucent.
Add bell pepper and carrot, cook for 5 minutes until softened.
Stir in bulgur wheat, cumin, and paprika, coating the grains with oil.
Pour in vegetable broth, bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes until bulgur is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Remove from heat, let stand covered for 5 minutes, then fluff with a fork.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with fresh herbs, and serve.
